survey.consent: Participants consent to the collection of reference numbers exclusively for identifying winners in this activity.
survey.successMessage:
We will use your feedback to further improve our services.
(Stay tuned for the prize announcement coming soon!)
survey.failMessage:
Thank you for your interest in our activity. The event has now ended.
(Stay tuned for more exciting activities in the future.)
